name: Thalassa
declaringWar: I see, prepare to drown beneath the waves then.
attacked: Testing me I see? Don't underestimate the sea.
defeated: The oceans will roar once more, we shall bide our time.
introduction: Welcome to my kingdom human, may you bring mutual blessings.
neutralHello: What do you require of me?
neutralLetsHearIt: What do you seek of this?
neutralNo: I am not in the position to agree.
Your tricks will not get you as far as you think surface dweller.
neutralYes: I hope this is a right choice.
I trust that this is not a ploy human.
hateHello: If it isn't the surface apes.
hateLetsHearIt: Quickly, do not waste my time.
Asking for help? My my, trapped in a corner aren't you.
hateNo: The sharks will enjoy your flesh.
hateYes: I will cast aside my enmity for now.
afterPeace: Very well, the waves will halt this time.
We will cease, but do not expect me to weaken human.
tradeRequest: Trading seems appropriate don't you think?
uniques: Can embark and move over Coasts and Oceans immediately
Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark

name: Sanguinarum
declaringWar: Disappointing, I suppose I will have to feast on your blood.
introduction: Welcome, I hope we bring a lasting impression.
neutralHello: I see you have come to visit, what do you need of me?
neutralLetsHearIt: Interesting, perhaps you could tell me more.
What do you seek of this?
neutralNo: This does not benefit my empire.
neutralYes: I accept, may it prosper us both
Ha, I like you son of man.
hateHello: Hello, would you be kind enough to pay us with your blood?
hateLetsHearIt: Let us see if this is worth my time.
Quickly, do not waste my time.
Asking for help? My my, trapped in a corner aren't you.
hateNo: Bah, you expect us to accept?
hateYes: Interesting, you aren't as foolish as I thought.
You have a deal son of man.
afterPeace: I shall return my troops home then.
tradeRequest: I bring special goods from my land, are you interested in them?
uniques: +[-60]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Desert]
+[100]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Forest]
+[100]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Tundra]
Earn [300]% of [military] opponent's [Strength] as [Culture] for kills
Double movement rate through Forest and Jungle
